reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great greater, greatest
reviews.reviewText: This app is so very helpful. I am for ever using it. I use it all the time. A girl or lady is always in need of a mirror that is so handy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2015
reviews.reviewText: It's a great app you can acutely see your self and you can adjust it the way you want it to! I have to rate this app 5 stars because it's useful and it's not blurry, it's clear the lighting is great I really recommend this for anyone . Use this app it's great 👐👐👐👐👐👐😉😉😉 ! It's really good for me because when I feel like somethings wrong with my face I can take this app and see ! I'm serious it's AWESOME !!😉😉

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Worked Poorly On My Device
reviews.reviewText: I didn't like this app at all. I have an Acer A500 tablet and in order to see myself in the mirror, I had to tilt the tablet at too much of an angle. It was a choice of either only seeing my left ear (or not at all) or having the tablet so angled that it was difficult to see. It was also a pretty grainy image. I do admit, though, that that could have been because of the lighting at the time. However, the whole point of having a mirror on a portable device is because you aren't in a well lit bathroom.Even though I ended up uninstalling it, I still wanted to give it at least three stars because it is a free app and I appreciate the trouble the designer went through to design it and post it for free.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 8, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Price isn't right for this free app
reviews.reviewText: App made me even uglier than before which is saying allot since my face can make my pet cats hair stand on end when she sees me filling her food bowl.I'm saying she rather starve than take a look at me.This app almost killed her when she hide by it only to see a even more homely version of me on the tablet which was also now a highly dangerous thing being screen shattered after a few close-ups.Apps aren't really free when there are casualties :-`(

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 11, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This mirror actually works pretty well
reviews.reviewText: Don't expect to have a clean mirror image because obviously it's not made with the same material. But out of all of the apps i have downloaded and tried over the years this is one that works. You can zoom in and out, you can change brightness as well as clarity. Has a light that helps. Also can take still images if needed. Also can rotate image a full 360

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This mirror app is totally amazing! I use it every day. It's better than the standard wall mirror. Because of my declinining health it is difficult to stand at the mirror to do my hair, makeup ect. I use it to do my hair and makeup. I love the adjustable lighting and the zoom control.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This app is so much better than I had expected it to be... I use it all the time (even for hair and makeup if I am not home). It is so clear, with zoom and a light... What more do you need?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2013
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as it says!
reviews.reviewText: A great way to check your reflection anytime you need. Much easier to use on a tablet than going to the photo window and using the settings there.Although I would not recommend this for putting in contacts or searching for a stray eyelash in the eye; for a quick lipstick application or to check your teeth after dinner, it is great! and it's free :)
Pretty good. It is works, but not as good as a real mirror. But it still do work

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 28, 2017

reviews.reviewText: Non mi ha convinto molto...sul kindle fire hd 8.9 nn riesco ad adattare l'area dello specchio a tutto lo schermo, me ne usa solo una parte.

Muy completa. Habrá hasta quien por coquetería y perfeccionismo rabie por no tener la opción de eliminar los feos y pequeñitos anuncios que sostienen la aplicación como si de un demasiado aparente clavo en tu pared se tratase.
Man kann gleich die Kamera des Tablets verwenden und hineinschauen.Ganz ohne Extras. Nicht brauchbar. KA wie viele Sterne. Ist nicht gut- aber auch nicht schlecht... Einfach UNNÖTIG!
